```{r}
#| label: cvevents
cvevents <- function(tbl, when, what, where, descr) {

    command_start <- "\\cvevent"
    tbl[[where]] <- gsub("\n", " \\\\newline ", tbl[[where]])
    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[when]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[where]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[descr]], "}"
        )

    cat(res, sep = "\n\n\n")
}

cvproj <- function(tbl,what,role,details,responsibilities){
    command_start <- "\\cvproj"
    # Convert vector to comma-separated string, removing any quotes
    resp_vec <- tbl[[responsibilities]]
    if (is.list(resp_vec)) {
        resp_vec <- unlist(resp_vec)
    }
    resp_string <- paste(resp_vec, collapse = "|||")
    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[role]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[details]], "}",
        "{", resp_string, "}"
    )

    cat(res, sep = "\n\n\n")
}
```
